name: sa3_p01_selected_person_characteristics_by_sex_census_2016
title: SA3-P01 Selected Person Characteristics by Sex-Census 2016

legal.licenceType: Creative Commons Attribution 2.5 Australia (CC BY 2.5 AU)

abstract:
SA3 based data for Selected Person Characteristics by Sex, in Place of Enumeration Profile (PEP), 2016 Census. Count of persons. The dataset includes the following characteristics: age bracket, overseas visitors, occupation of a private or other dwelling, Aboriginal and/or Torres Strait Islander status, birthplace, language spoken at home, Australian citizenship, age bracket of those attending an educational institution and highest year level of schooling completed. The data is by SA3 2016 boundaries. Periodicity: 5-Yearly.
Note: There are small random adjustments made to all cell values to protect the confidentiality of data. These adjustments may cause the sum of rows or columns to differ by small amounts from table totals.
For more information visit the data source: http://www.abs.gov.au/census.

selectedAttributes.name: lang_spoken_home_eng_only_p
selectedAttributes.title: Persons that speak English at Home
selectedAttributes.description: Persons that speak English at Home.

selectedAttributes.name: lang_spoken_home_oth_lang_p
selectedAttributes.title: Persons that speak Other Language at Home
selectedAttributes.description: Persons that speak Other Language at Home. Includes 'Inadequately described' and 'Non-verbal, so described'. Excludes not stated.
